articles.description: World’s largest movie chain to set three price points at US locations, with middle seats the most expensive
articles.content: When choosing seats at the movies, most of us do the same thing: pick a spot as close to the middle as possible. Now AMC, the largest movie theater chain in the world, has announced a new plan to rai… [+3352 chars]
